name: Ice World Demo
description:
PLEASE READ:

Virtually everything in this demo, including the title and most other names and music, is a placeholder for now using basic RPG Maker MZ assets. As the project develops, I will likely replace these assets with more unique and interesting assets, but this is the best I have to work with for now, as I am just trying to make sure I have a basic foundation upon which the rest of the project can be built.

This demo, if explored in full, will take approximately 10 minutes, so I do hope you enjoy it!

If you would like to support this project and help to expedite future build, please consider donating or visiting my Patreon page via my itch.io profile.

Thank you for trying out my game!
